a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of males vs. females with autistic spectrum disorder, 2019
Share of males versus females with autistic spectrum disorder, which is inclusive of autism and Asperger
Syndrome. This prevalence is age-standardized to compare between countries and with time.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
